description: The file defines an Angular component 'GameCanvasComponent' that manages the game canvas rendering, user input handling, and game loop control for a browser game. It interacts with services for game logic and audio playback.

classes.name: GameCanvasComponent
classes.description: Angular component managing the game rendering canvas, handling user input, and controlling game loop and state transitions.

methods.name: ngAfterViewInit
methods.description: Initializes the canvas context, attaches it to the game service, and starts the game loop.

methods.name: resizeCanvas
methods.description: Adjusts the canvas size and triggers a delayed resize update via game service.

methods.name: loop
methods.description: Main game loop handling rendering, game over, level complete states, and scheduling the next frame.

methods.name: startGame
methods.description: Initializes and starts the game and background music.

methods.name: restartGame
methods.description: Restarts the game by calling startGame.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key down events for arrow keys and spacebar, forwarding them to the game service.

methods.name: onKeyUp
methods.description: Handles key up events, notifying the game service.

methods.name: onTouchStart
methods.description: Handles touch start events, forwarding to the game service.

methods.name: onTouchMove
methods.description: Handles touch move events, forwarding to the game service.

methods.name: onTouchEnd
methods.description: Handles touch end events, forwarding to the game service.
